name: Cybercop
storyline: In Cybercop, embark on a nostalgic journey through a cyberpunk city as our pixelated hero, driven by a heartfelt mission - to find his loyal companion, a cybernetic dog. Navigate the neon-lit streets, battle Arcade-Bosses, confront enemy civilians, and combat cyber aliens, all in pursuit of reuniting with man's best friend.
